metadata.title: CVE-2020-24583 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Django 2.2 before 2.2.16, 3.0 before 3.0.10, and3.1 before 3.1.1 (when Python 3.7+ is used).FILE_UPLOAD_DIRECTORY_PERMISSIONS mode was not applied tointermediate-level directories created in the process of uploading files.It was also not applied to intermediate-level collected static directorieswhen using the collectstatic management command.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24583` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.2').
